oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes - Season 2, Episode 7 - "The Crooked Man" - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC program The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes, season 2, episode 7 "The Crooked Man", part 2. Originally broadcast 1940-11-10. Featuring Basil Rathbone (Sherlock), Nigel Bruce (Watson), Edith Meiser (dramatization), and Knox Manning (presenter). Sponsored by Bromo Quinine.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Basil Rathbone; Nigel Bruce
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: The Crooked Man (part 2) -- Closing statement (Knox Manning)
